meanings.sent1: The uncatchy song faded into the background.
meanings.sent2: The uncatchy jingle didn't stick in my mind.
meanings.sent3: The uncatchy advertisement failed to make an impression.
meanings.sent4: Her uncatchy outfit blended into the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The uncatchy logo was quickly forgotten.

meanings.definition: Lacking a catchy or memorable quality.
meanings.sent1: The uncatchy movie plot was easily forgettable.
meanings.sent2: His uncatchy jokes didn't make anyone laugh.
meanings.sent3: The uncatchy party had guests leaving early.
meanings.sent4: The uncatchy painting failed to capture attention.
meanings.sent5: The uncatchy melody fell flat with the audience.
